ttp_template:
<group name="cert_usage_issuer_status_subject_name">
  Status: {{STATUS | ORPHRASE}}
  Certificate Usage: {{CERT_USAGE | ORPHRASE}}
  cn={{ISSUER | ORPHRASE}}
  Name: {{SUBJECT_NAME | ORPHRASE}}
  Org Unit: {{SUBJECT_ORG_UNIT | ORPHRASE}}
  Began: {{VALIDITY_BEGIN | ORPHRASE}}
  Expires: {{VALIDITY_EXPIRES | ORPHRASE}}
  {{TRUSTPOINTS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Certificate
  Status: Available
  Certificate Usage: General Purpose
  Issuer:
    cn=issuer
  Subject:
    Name: Device Cert Name
    Org Unit: Network Devices
  Period of Validity:
    Began: 07:40:01 UTC Sep 1 2023
    Expires: 07:40:01 UTC Sep 1 2024
  Associated Trustpoints:
    TPM-trustpoint
    RA-trustpoint
textfsm_template:
Value STATUS (Available|Unavailable)
Value CERT_USAGE (.+)
Value ISSUER (\S+)
Value CN (\S+)
Value SUBJECT_NAME (.+)
Value SUBJECT_ORG_UNIT (.+)
Value VALIDITY_BEGIN (.+)
Value VALIDITY_EXPIRES (.+)
Value TRUSTPOINTS (.+)

Start
  ^\s*Certificate\s*$$
  ^\s*Status: ${STATUS}\s*$$
  ^\s*Certificate Usage: ${CERT_USAGE}\s*$$
  ^\s*Issuer:\s*$$
  ^\s*cn=${ISSUER}\s*$$
  ^\s*Subject:\s*$$
  ^\s*Name: ${SUBJECT_NAME}\s*$$
  ^\s*Org Unit: ${SUBJECT_ORG_UNIT}\s*$$
  ^\s*Period of Validity:\s*$$
  ^\s*Began: ${VALIDITY_BEGIN}\s*$$
  ^\s*Expires: ${VALIDITY_EXPIRES}\s*$$
  ^\s*Associated Trustpoints:\s*$$
  ^\s*${TRUSTPOINTS}\s*$$ -> Record
